name: Lodestar: Stygian Skies - Tactical Science Fiction RPG
blurb: Lodestar: Stygian Skies is a 3D voxel, sci-fi, tactical turn-based combat/exploration game, rich with lore and procedural elements.

rewards.reward: Help support this game and get instant access to a backer exclusive desktop wallpaper! See Update #2.
Pledge at this level and get instant access to a backer exclusive desktop wallpaper! You will also get access to the downloadable, DRM free copy of the digital soundtrack when it is complete.

Protos: You get access to a downloadable, DRM free copy of the final game for Linux and Windows when the game is complete. If the Mac extra goal is reached, you get access to a downloadable, DRM free copy of the final game for Mac when the game is complete. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Trochia Protos: \r\n($16) Protos pledge reward + You get access to the downloadable, DRM free copy of the digital soundtrack when it is complete. You also get access to the downloadable game beta when it becomes available. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Deft\u2019ros: \r\n($16) Protos pledge reward + You will get access to the downloadable PDF copy of the lore book. If the extra goal for artwork is met or exceeded, this lore book will contain commissioned color artwork. You also get access to the downloadable game beta when it becomes available. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Triton: \r\n($32) Trochia Protos and ($32) Deft\u2019ros pledge rewards + You get exclusive access to the developer forum and to the downloadable game alpha when it becomes available. This reward is for those of you who wish to be more involved in the development of the game. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Trochia Triton:\r\n($32) Trochia Protos and ($32) Deft\u2019ros pledge rewards + You will receive a copy of the printed lore book. If the extra goal for artwork is met or exceeded, this lore book will contain commissioned color artwork. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Tet\u2019ros: \r\n($64) Triton and ($64) Trochia Triton pledge rewards + Your name will go into the credits and on the website as a significant backer. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Pem\u2019tos:\r\n($128) Tet\u2019ros pledge reward + Your name, or a name of your choosing, will be used as a pivotal character in the history and lore of the Sisyphus.* You can choose the character alignment and his/her motivations/goals/agenda. This character will appear in the lore book, and reference to this character will be made in the lore revealed in-game. Your name will go into the credits and on the website as a significant backer, and your contribution to the game will be noted. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Echtos:\r\n($128) Tet\u2019ros pledge reward + You get to design a monster for the official game. This includes attributes such as the monster name, general toughness, special attacks, appearance and the climate in which the monster appears.* Your name will go into the credits and on the website as a significant backer, and your contribution to the game will be noted. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Ebdomos:\r\n($128) Tet\u2019ros pledge reward + You get to design an NPC for the official game: name, class, occupation, appearance, demeanor, and function.* This NPC will be unique, rare, and have enhanced attributes. Players will be able to find and recruit your NPC to join the base camp. Your name will go into the credits and on the website as a significant backer, and your contribution to the game will be noted. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Ogdoos:\r\n($128) Tet\u2019ros pledge reward + You get to design a quest for the official game: the quest, quest NPC, up to two quest exclusive monsters, and the quest reward.* Your name will go into the credits and on the website as a significant backer, and your contribution to the game will be noted. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

En\u2019tos:\r\n($128) Tet\u2019ros pledge reward + Your name or company name will be shown during game startup as a sponsor.* Your name or company name will go into the credits, into the lore book, and on the website, listed first as a prime backer. If the final extra goal is reached, you will be awarded access to the source code when released.

Trochia En\u2019tos:\r\n($128) Tet\u2019ros pledge reward + You will be awarded access to the source code immediately following completion of the game, regardless if the final extra goal is met. The code will be released to you under an open source license. Your name will go into the credits, into the lore book, and on the website, listed first as a prime backer.

Dek\u2019tos:\r\n($2048) Trochia En\u2019tos pledge reward + You will receive a hand-made planet from the Lodestar Universe\u2019s Kol\u2019estri system. You can choose your planet from any of the nine planets listed in the \u2018Pledge Rewards\u2019 section. The planet consists of a hand-painted sphere, mounted on a base made of stained and lacquered wood. An engraved plaque with the planet name, your name, and your contribution is mounted to the base. The engraving is subject to your approval and can be altered according to your wishes.* You will also receive a laminated card detailing the planet\u2019s specifications. Your name or company name will be shown during game startup as a sponsor.* Your name or company name will go into the credits, into the lore book, and on the website, listed first as a prime backer.

Achro\u2019zoni:\r\n($2048) Trochia En\u2019tos pledge reward + You will receive a unique, hand-made Astraean Xenodrone. You are awarded points that you can spend on the customization of your personal drone, just as Astraeans do in-game. The modifications you choose will affect the resulting appearance of your drone, and no two drones are created alike. The drone consists of a hand-modeled, hand-painted body, with additional details created from metal and plastic. Each drone comes mounted on a stained and lacquered wood base with an engraved plaque with the drone\u2019s id number, your name, and your contribution. The engraving is subject to your approval and can be altered according to your wishes.* You will also receive a laminated card detailing the drone\u2019s core specifications and chosen modifications. Your name or company name will be shown during game startup as a sponsor.* Your name or company name will go into the credits, into the lore book, and on the website, listed first as a prime backer.
